Not trying to offend you, but I must say I'm not very impressed with the quality, partially because your source (which, btw, wasnt HD, the source for that source was) was already very compressed and re-ecoding low/medium quality to ~half its size can't be that great. Compared to, for example, HIMYM.S01.DVDRip.XviD-TOPAZ, the video contains more blocks, is less colorful and a bit too bright. The audio quality is too low (re-encoding mp3 to 112kbps cbr mp3 is a bad idea).
Anyway, I'm a bit of a HQ freak, so many people might find these eps very watchable, but I suggest using an actual HD (720p or higher) source next time.
Nevertheless, I appreciate your effort and seeding! (And if people don't agree with me, good for them :))

It's a bit of a mess trying to download 5 season at once like HIMY... couldnt know how much seeder/leechers for a particular season.. I know we can skip files, but it's comforting to me to know a particular season have a lot of seed for better speed... Just my 2 cents :P... 

About quality of this upload ( I downloaded last 2 from season 3, season 4 and season 5), I cant say I'm very impressed, I understand that you had to use different sources, so I think the defect is just your sources fault ;P... so most are pretty good, there's a few ( 1 or 2 in season 4 i think ) has audio sync problem... a few are too bright.. 

All in all, I'm happy that at less than 100MB, it's very watchable and you made it possible for me to download it in a logical time.. Thanks for all your hardwork, I've bookmarked your upload list page..
